analysis.heading: Primary daylight plane (rear)
analysis.content: Fig 23 Side elevation showing Rear primary daylight plane
figures: Architectural diagram showing side elevation with measurements: 7.5' max protrusions on each side with 5' min separation, 24' height, 60° angle
codes: • 17' for structures on substandard or flag lots
• variable for structures located in flood zones except on substandard and flag lots - up to 33'
Cumulative length of protrusions must not exceed 15' on any one side.
Rear protrusions subject to same rules as side protrusions regardless of flood plane
